title: All you need is Braum
body:
_Braum (x3)
Braum (x3)
Braum (x3)_

_There's nothing you can do that can't be done
Nothing you can't carry in lane with Braum
Nothing that can prevent you to learn how to play the game
It's easy!_

_There's no one you can kill that can't be killed
No one I can save who can't be saved
Nothing you can do but I can be there for you in time
It's easy!_

_All you need is Braum
All you need is Braum
All you need is Braum, Braum
Braum is all you need._

_All you need is Braum
All you need is Braum
All you need is Braum, Braum
Braum is all you need._

_There's nothing you can't buy that can't be bought
No gold that you need that I can't bestow
Nowhere you can be that isn't where I can make you be
It's easy!_

_All you need is Braum
All you need is Braum
All you need is Braum, Braum
Braum is all you need._

_All you need is Braum (all to dragon now!)
All you need is Braum (everybody!)
All you need is Braum, Braum
Braum is all you need._

Dedicata a Riot Zhydaris, per ringraziarlo. :)

replies.body: Onore e gloria al pelo masculo, nemmeno la vile giungla resiste a lui!
saranno i baffi chi lo sa
Il portone di LoL Ã¨ il migliore.{{champion:201}}
